events.title: RTV CRON Episode 1
events.description: We're thrilled to launch RTV CRON, our new recurring series where cybersecurity meets community! We'll have a live workshop (speaker TBD) and we'll also be discussing the latest news in the village.

events.title: RTV CRON Episode 2
events.description: RTV cron Episode 2 will be a live workshop (speaker TBD) and we'll also be discussing the latest news in the village.

events.title: RTV @ HackSpaceCon
events.description: RTV will be at HackSpaceCon 2025. We'll have a booth and we'll be discussing the latest news in the village. We'll also be hosting a CTF competition.

events.title: Red Team Village at DEF CON 33
events.location: Las Vegas Convention Center, Red Team Village Area
events.description: Visit the village at DEF CON 33! We'll have a weekend packed with workshops, activities, swag, and so much more!
